channel.title: checklist on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in checklist on Analyst

item.title: 🧼 Media Sterilisation
item.description: Before copying evidence or making a disk image, one needs to sterilise the target media to ensure that data on that disk before this operation would not meddle with the evidence data.

item.title: 🗒 Incident Response Methodology
item.description: Preparation 📝 Compile a list of all your assets (servers, networks, applications etc) 📈 Rank them by level of importance.

item.title: 🗒️ Forensic Investigation Methodology
item.description: Before this process starts, there probably has already been some Incident Response done or even finished (refer to https://bakerst221b.

item.title: ⛅️ AWS Evidence Collection
item.description: Are there any Shadow Cloud Accounts? Could be the first place to look when investigating.

item.title: 📘 Manual
item.description: Approach Run a tool to collect all the artefacts for this OS (for example, autorunc.exe for Windows) on the machines in question.
